import { Navbar, Container, Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import IconUser from "../../Assets/Icon/IconUser.tsx"; import IconMail from "../../Assets/Icon/IconMail.tsx"; import IconLockDots from "../../Assets/Icon/IconLockDots.tsx"; import IconLogout from "../../Assets/Icon/IconLogout.tsx"; // Import images directly import userProfileImage from "../../Assets/images/user-profile.jpeg"; const NavigationBar = () => { return ( Navbar with text
John Doe Pro
Profile Inbox Lock Screen Sign Out ); }; export default NavigationBar;
